name: DataSync Pro
idea: An AI-powered data integration platform that automatically connects, syncs, and transforms data across 200+ business applications. DataSync Pro eliminates manual data entry, reduces integration time from weeks to minutes, and ensures real-time data consistency across your entire tech stack.

business.target_audience: Operations managers and IT leaders at mid-market companies (100-1000 employees) who struggle with data silos and manual data entry across multiple business tools
pain_points: Data silos causing inconsistent information across teams
Hours wasted on manual data entry and reconciliation
Expensive custom integrations that break with updates
No real-time visibility into cross-platform data
business.value_proposition: Eliminate data silos and manual entry with AI-powered integrations that set up in minutes, not months
unique_selling_points: AI auto-maps fields and handles data transformation
Enterprise-grade security with SOC 2 Type II

features.title: 200+ Connectors
features.description: Pre-built integrations for all major business applications including Salesforce, HubSpot, Shopify, QuickBooks, and more.

features.title: AI Field Mapping
features.description: Our AI automatically maps fields between applications, handles data transformation, and learns from your corrections.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Changes propagate instantly across all connected systems with intelligent conflict resolution.
